MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-screen-desktop",
    Page: "interface",
    Title: "Interface"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-docs",
    Page: "tables",
    Title: "Tables"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-briefcase",
    Page: "contracts",
    Title: "Smart Contracts"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-settings",
    Page: "parameters",
    Title: "Ecosystem parameters"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-globe",
    Page: "languages",
    Title: "Language resources"
)
MenuItem(

    Page: "import",
    Title: "Import"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-cloud-download",
    Page: "export",
    Title: "Export"
)

    MenuItem(
        Icon: "icon-lock",
        Page: "vde",
        Title: "Dedicated Ecosystem"
    )
}

parameters.Name: application_type
parameters.Value: CAR-145 Application,CAR M Subpart F Application

parameters.Name: file_types
parameters.Value: Trade License (includes maintenance activity),Reference number of EASA 145 or CAR-M subpart F approval,Approval held by National Authority/other Authorities,Security Clearance in case of Local Organization

parameters.Name: payment_confirmation
parameters.Value: Payment due prior the Application,Corporate - Payment at the end of the Month,Cash - Issue Payment

parameters.Name: specialized_services
parameters.Value: Eddy Current Inspection,Heat Treatment,Liquid Penetrant Inspection,Magnetic particle Inspection,Painting,Ultrasonic Inspection
